list.name: FIRE-STARTERS
list.description: Amber runs fast for x seconds while spilling her fire fluid, which she can then ignite.
list.descriptionHtml: Amber runs fast for x seconds while spilling her fire fluid, which she can then ignite.

list.name: DANCING-FLAMES
list.description: Amber creates x orbiting flames around her for x seconds, dealing x damage on hit.
list.descriptionHtml: Amber creates x orbiting flames around her for x seconds, dealing x damage on hit.
